thread.title: Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text: I ordered about 20 trees from Willis Orchards and they were promptly delivered in early spring in great condition. They use a water gel to keep the roots moist which is better than wet newspaper IMO. I sorted my order and realized I was short two trees. I called the number in my order form and spoke with a woman who gave a specific person's email and directions of what to send him. He contacted me quickly and filled the rest of my order without hassle. I would definitely buy from and recommend Willis Orchard in the future
